div.p: C.M.W. and M.I.B. designed the study. C.M.W. and H.R. conducted the field work and sampled the core. Isotope analyses of guano and radiocarbon measurements were prepared by C.M.W., J.H. and H.R. Compound-Specific Isotope Analyses were conducted by B.Z. All authors contributed to interpretation of the data. C.M.W. and M.I.B. wrote the manuscript, and all authors provided comments and revisions.
